text: Dughiar igharazir mamɨn, Israelia ua Filistiaba ko Gopɨn nguibamɨn uariv sosi. Ezɨ Betlehemɨn gumazim Jareoregim, an otarim Elhanan, a Getɨn nguibar ekiamɨn gumazim, a Goliatɨn igharazim mɨsoghezɨma an areme. Goliatɨn afuzir mɨsiam bar ekevegha mati me iniba nuavir masinɨn tretbar suizir aghorir bar dafam.
